ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful to Takashi Okamoto (Department of Pharmacology, Faculty of Medicine, Shimane University, Izumo, Shimane, Japan), Nobuyuki Akita (Department of Clinical Engineering, Faculty of Medical Engineering, Suzuka University of Medical Science, Suzuka, Mie, Japan), and Tatsuya Hayashi (Department of Biochemistry, Mie Prefecture College of Nursing, Tsu, Mie Japan), who contributed to this study. This work was supported, in part, by a Grant-in-Aid for Scientific Research (C) (Grant Number 16K08633) from the Japan Society for the Promotion of Science and an industryâ€“academia joint research fund from the Konan Chemical Manufacturing Co. Ltd., Yokkaichi, Mie, Japan.
